headline: TJX Companies (TJX): Evaluating Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength and Retail Sector Trends
summary: TJX Companies (TJX) has seen its stock performance fluctuate over the past month as investors weigh recent trends in the retail sector. The company’s returns over the past 3 months remain up 12%. See our latest analysis for TJX Companies. TJX Companies’ share price has gained steady ground this year, with momentum still positive despite some recent sideways action. Its one-year total shareholder return of 24.6% shows why it continues attracting long-term investors. If you’re curious what...
